level.text: If a licensee wishes to change the licensee’s place of business within the District of Columbia to another location, the licensee shall give written notice to the Director in accordance with the provisions of ยง 5 of the Act, as amended [D.C. Official Code ยง 47-2884.05 (b)].
When the transfer is authorized, the Director shall amend the license accordingly and notify the Chief of Police.
